itunes:title: whitney simmons | it's a beautiful day to be alive
title: whitney simmons | it's a beautiful day to be alive
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
description:
It's a beautiful day to be alive as the fun & gains fam is humbled to welcome Whitney Simmons to the podcast! britt & whit go deep about feeling alone, falling in/out of love with the gym, lifestyle evolution, taking years for yourself, dating, stigmas around mental health, the female fitness industry, trends, life online, fear of starting & more, before answering some of YOUR rapid fire q's.


Train with Britt Start Your 7 Day Free Trial Today!

Shop Gymshark Shop my favorite Gym Fits!

4:00 rejection

5:30 how YouTube began

6:50 leaving the desk job

9:45 evolution

15:00 taking years for yourself

17:05 thoughts on the female fitness industry

17:40 TikTok toxicity
